title: Candied Bacon Bits
directions: Prep Time: Minutes ━ Difficulty: Easy ━ Servings: Servings
Cook bacon in 10-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat until crisp and well rendered, 6 to 8 minutes.
Using slotted spoon, remove bacon from skillet and discard fat.
Return bacon to skillet and add brown sugar and vinegar.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until bacon is evenly coated.
Transfer to plate in single layer.
Break up any large chunks before serving.
